TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit Binder extends System.Object

summary.span: Selects a member from a list of candidates, and performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

span.span: Selects a member from a list of candidates, and performs type conversion from actual argument type to formal argument type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现类如由方法，若要执行，从一组可能成员选择基于一组参数类型和自变量值;，后者选择基于参数类型; 等的方法。Implementations of the class are used by methods such as , which selects from a set of possible members to execute, based on a set of parameter types and argument values; , which selects a method based on parameter types; and so on. 默认实现类提供的属性。A default implementation of the class is provided by the property. ## Examples 下面的示例实现，并演示的所有成员`Binder`类。The following example implements and demonstrates all members of the `Binder` class. 私有方法`CanConvertFrom`对于给定的类型查找兼容的类型。The private method `CanConvertFrom` finds compatible types for a given type. [!code-cpp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CPP/binder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/CS/binder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Binder_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Binder_1/VB/binder.vb#1)]

When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , , , , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`bindingAttr`不包括，由提供的默认联编程序实现只是返回的第一个元素`match`。If `bindingAttr` does not include , the default binder implementation provided by simply returns the first element of `match`. 不进行选择。No selection is done. 此方法提供的绑定的控件。This method controls the binding provided by .

summary.span: Selects a method to invoke from the given set of methods, based on the supplied arguments.

span.span: Selects a method to invoke from the given set of methods, based on the supplied arguments.
The matching method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认的联编程序会考虑这两个参数具有值和`params`数组 (`ParamArray` Visual Basic 中的数组)。The default binder takes into account both parameters that have values and `params` arrays (`ParamArray` arrays in Visual Basic). 因此，很可能在情况下查找匹配项其中`args`和`match`不包含相同数量的元素。Thus, it is possible to find a match in cases where `args` and `match` do not contain the same number of elements. 联编程序使客户端将映射回其原始格式的自变量数组，如果自变量数组具有操作的。The binder enables a client to map the array of arguments back to its original form if the argument array has been manipulated by . 使用此重新映射功能时应存在的此类参数取回按引用自变量。Use this remap capability to get back by-reference arguments when such arguments are present. 当你按名称传递自变量时，活页夹重新排序自变量数组。When you pass arguments by name, the binder reorders the argument array. `state`参数将跟踪的参数重新排序，从而使活页夹的方法能够为其原始形式自变量数组重新排序。The `state` parameter keeps track of argument reordering, thus enabling the binder's method to reorder the argument array to its original form. 方法由方法。The method is used by the method.

exception.span: For the default binder, contains multiple methods that are equally good matches for .

span.span: For the default binder, contains multiple methods that are equally good matches for .

exception.span: For example, contains a MyClass object that implements the IMyClass interface, and contains a method that takes MyClass and a method that takes IMyClass.

span.span: For example, contains a MyClass object that implements the IMyClass interface, and contains a method that takes MyClass and a method that takes IMyClass.

exception.span: For the default binder, contains no methods that can accept the arguments supplied in .

span.span: For the default binder, contains no methods that can accept the arguments supplied in .

exception.span: For the default binder, is or an empty array.

span.span: For the default binder, is or an empty array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 反射建模常规类型系统可访问性的规则。Reflection models the accessibility rules of the common type system. 例如，如果调用方在同一程序集，调用方不将特殊权限需要用于内部成员。For example, if the caller is in the same assembly, the caller does not need special permissions for internal members. 否则，调用方需要。Otherwise, the caller needs . 这是与受保护的成员的查找一致、 专用和等。This is consistent with lookup of members that are protected, private, and so on. 一般原则是，`ChangeType`应执行仅扩大强制转换，永远不会丢失数据。The general principle is that `ChangeType` should perform only widening coercions, which never lose data. 扩大强制的一个示例强制转换为 64 位有符号的整数的值将 32 位有符号的整数的值。An example of a widening coercion is coercing a value that is a 32-bit signed integer to a value that is a 64-bit signed integer. 这被有别于收缩强制不同，后者可能会丢失数据。This is distinguished from a narrowing coercion, which may lose data. 收缩强制的一个示例强制转换为 32 位有符号整数一个 64 位带符号的整数。An example of a narrowing coercion is coercing a 64-bit signed integer to a 32-bit signed integer. 下表列出了默认情况下执行的强制`ChangeType`。The following table lists the coercions performed by the default `ChangeType`. |源类型Source type|目标类型Target type| |-----------------|-----------------| |任何类型Any type|与其基类型。Its base type.| |任何类型Any type|它实现的接口。The interface it implements.| |CharChar|UInt16、UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |ByteByte|Char、UInt16、Int16、UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleChar, UInt16, Int16, UInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |SByteSByte|Int16、Int32、Int64、Single、DoubleInt16, Int32, Int64, Single, Double| |UInt16UInt16|UInt32、Int32、UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt32, Int32, UInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |Int16Int16|Int32、Int64、Single、DoubleInt32, Int64, Single, Double| |UInt32UInt32|UInt64、Int64、Single、DoubleUInt64, Int64, Single, Double| |Int32Int32|Int64、Single、DoubleInt64, Single, Double| |UInt64UInt64|Single、DoubleSingle, Double| |Int64Int64|Single、DoubleSingle, Double| |SingleSingle|DoubleDouble| |非引用Non-reference|按引用。By-reference.|
